message:
Wow! This white officer saved a crying, distraught black man from jumping from a bridge into traffic. This officer is a HERO. 

I can't believe people paint cops as Racists! Our men & women in blue are called on to do this every single Day! 

Share this video EVERYwhere until EVERYone understands how important our men & women in blue are to our Society! #BlueLivesMatter!!
